name: Hero Banner Ultimate
author: WP OnlineSupport, Essential Plugin

sections.description:
Explore Hero Banner Features | Annual or Lifetime Bundle Deal

Add hero banner with the help of background image OR background color OR background video. Hero Banner Ultimate comes with 4 types of layouts where you can manage you hero banner design.

Also work with Gutenberg shortcode block.

Plugin shortcode

[hbupro_banner id="XX"]

You can also display popup in template/php file:

<?php echo do_shortcode('[hbupro_banner id="XX"]'); ?>

Where id is the banner id.

In web design, a hero banner is a large web banner image, prominently placed on a web page, generally in the front and center. The hero banner is often the first visual a visitor encounters on the site; it presents an overview of the site’s most important content. A hero image often consists of background image OR background color OR background video and text.

Large fullscreen backgrounds and hero banners can be used in single page designs with ease.

Hero Banner Ultimate Features

  • Background image
  • Background color
  • Background video
  • Title and sub title font size
  • Title and sub title font color
  • Banner inner padding
  • Banner overlay setting
  • Call to Action Setting

PRO Features :

Premium Version

  • 10 cool layouts.
  • Gradient OR Plain Background Color Option
  • Added lots of options
  • Extra Setting for Mobile View

Explore and check pro feature
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘hero-banner-ultimate’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the “hero-banner-ultimate” list plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.4.1 (23, August 2024)

  • [*] Check compatibility to WordPress version 6.6.1

1.4 (02, August 2023)

  • [*] Update – Use escaping and sanitize functions for better security.
  • [*] Check compatibility to WordPress version 6.2.2

1.3.4 (11, Feb 2022)

  • [-] Removed some unwanted code and files.
  • [*] Tested up to: 5.9

1.3.3 (16, Nov 2021)

  • [*] Fix – Resolve Gutenberg WP-Editor script related issue.
  • [*] Update – Add some text and links in Readme file.

1.3.2 (22, Sep 2021)

  • [*] Tested up to: 5.8.1
  • [*] Updated demo link

1.3.1 (20 Aug 2021)

  • [*] Updated all external links
  • [*] Tweak – Code optimization and performance improvements.
  • [*] Updated language file.

1.3 (02 June 2021)

  • [*] jQuery( document ).ready(function($) is replaced with function( $ ) to solve the issue with 3rd party plugin and theme js error.
  • [*] Tested up to: 5.7.2
  • [*] Tweak – Code optimization and performance improvements.

1.2 (14, July 2020)

  • [*] Follow WordPress Detailed Plugin Guidelines for Offload Media and Analytics Code.
  • [+] Update – Minified some CSS and JS.
  • [*] Tweak – Code optimization and performance improvements.

1.1

  • [+] Added wp_reset_postdata() in the shortcode file.
  • [+] Added esc_attr(), esc_url() and esc_html() in all layout files.
  • [*] Fixed notice in the shortcode file.

1.0

  • Initial release.
